author: sky.cactus
content: Template doesn't say it is optional, so I have been treating it as non-optional.

author: sky.cactus
content: In this particular case, their simple summary felt more like an abstract anyway, so it was an easy solution.

author: sky.cactus
content: If someone pushes back hard against having an abstract I would probably cave.  I really do like consistency in structure of EIPs though, I feel like it makes it easier for tools to deal with them and for people who understand the structure to quickly skim them.
